Posts.Content: ivy62 wrote: hello lady's god is good, i went in for my follow- up appt today. the doctor came in asking question, that i fealt he should already know and said that he was going to take out of draining tube and went out the room. so when he return, i told him that he need to slow down and that i had have question's. so i asked what i had to ask. then when i was discharged, i asked about the temporare breast then i was sent to that deparment. i am saying all of this because no one was giving me the information that i needed . and if it was not from this site i would not have known about anything. and at this time i would like to thank the friend that told me about this site. to my sister's here (I THANK YOU SO MUCH). and as i a(start your day with a pray). and also i learned today , sometimes u have to slow others down to get what u need.  start each day with prayer Dx 1/2/2008, DCIS, Stage 0 Log in to post a reply
